patthana1.15:8.1: Hīnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hīno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.15:8.2: hīnaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā. #1
patthana1.15:9.1: Hīnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca majjhimo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.15:10.1: Hīnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hīno ca majjhimo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana1.15:10.2: hīnaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #3
patthana1.15:11.1: Majjhimaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca majjhimo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.15:11.2: majjhimaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.15:11.8: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā;
patthana1.15:11.11: mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ. #1
patthana1.15:12.1: Paṇītaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca paṇīto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana1.15:13.1: Majjhimañca paṇītañca dhammaṃ paṭicca majjhimo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.15:13.2: paṇīte khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #1
patthana1.15:14.1: Hīnañca majjhimañca dhammaṃ paṭicca majjhimo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.15:14.2: hīne khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #1
